name: Porygon-Z
description: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.effect: This Pokémon inflicts twice as much damage with moves whose types match its own, rather than the usual same-type attack bonus of 1.5×.
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type.

abilities.name: Download
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, its Attack or Special Attack, whichever corresponds to its opponents' weaker total defensive stat, rises one stage.  In the event of a tie, Special Attack is raised.  This ability also takes effect when acquired during a battle.
abilities.description: Adjusts power according to the foe's ability.

abilities.name: Analytic
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn.  future sight and doom desire are unaffected.
abilities.description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
